message.entry: Parameter ''{0}'' in block ''{1}'' is incorrect.
Parameters ''{0}'' and ''{1}'' in block ''{2}'' are incorrect.
A change in parameter ''{0}'' for block ''{1}'' is not allowed when the simulation is running.

A pattern change was detected for the matrix parameter. A zero entry in the matrix was change to a non-zero number in row {0,number,integer}. Matrix pattern cannot be changed at run time because this parameter is internally represented as a sparse matrix.
Number of non-zero entries in the matrix parameter changed. Matrix pattern cannot be changed at run time because this parameter is internally represented as a sparse matrix.
D matrix changed from zero to non-zero at runtime. This is not allowed at runtime because the simulation was started with a zero D matrix implying no direct dependency of output on the block input.

Number of non-zero entries in row {0, number, integer} for the matrix parameter changed at run time. Matrix pattern cannot be changed at run time because the block is using this parameter as a sparse matrix.
Number of rows and columns in the updated matrix parameter are different from the original dimensions of the matrix.
One or more entries in the parameter are not finite.
Parameter is not a real-valued matrix or vector.
Matrix A of a state-space system must be square.
Matrix B of a state-space system must have the same number of rows as matrix A.
Matrix C of a state-space system must have the same number of columns as matrix A.
Matrix D of a state-space system must have the same number of columns as matrix B and the same number of rows as matrix C.
Matrices B and D both have 0 columns. At least one of matrices B and D must have 1 or more columns.
Matrices C and D both have 0 rows. At least one of matrices C and D must have 1 or more rows.
Initial condition must be either a scalar or a vector with a length that matches the number of rows in matrix A.
Matrix A is undefined for the block. Simulink cannot completely determine a valid state-space system.
Dimensions of matrix ''{0}'' in block ''{1}'' is higher than 2.
A change in parameter value from sparse to dense matrix or vice versa is not allowed for State-space block ''{0}'' when the simulation is running.

Block ''{0}'' parameter D is set to a sparse matrix which has no non-zero values and parameter ''{1}'' is on. A zero sparse matrix cannot be changed to non-zero at runtime. Turn off ''{1}'' when setting D to a sparse zero matrix.

Block ''{0}'' will ignore parameter setting ''{1}'' of the ''{2}'' parameter because ''{3}'' is set to ''{4}'' which conflicts General realization setting. Set ''{3}'' to ''{5}'' or ''{6}'' and ''{2}'' to ''{1}'' if General realization behavior is desired.

Parameter ''{1}'' of block ''{0}'' is set to ''on'' thus requesting zero to non-zero tunability of D matrix. However, ''{2}'' is set to ''{3}'' which conflicts the D matrix tunability request. Set ''{2}'' to ''{4}'' or ''{5}'' if D matrix tunability from zero to non-zero is desired. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="fixit" id="AutoTunability" retvalue="false"> <cmd>set_param(''{0}'',''ParameterTunability'',''Auto'');</cmd> <txt> Set ''{2}'' to ''{4}''. </txt> </action> <action type="fixit" id="UnconstrainedTunability" retvalue="false"> <cmd>set_param(''{0}'',''ParameterTunability'',''Unconstrained'');</cmd> <txt> Set ''{2}'' to ''{5}''. </txt> </action> </actions>

Unable to write to parameter ''{1}'' of block ''{0}'' with Parameter Writer blocks because ''{1}'' is set to ''{2}''. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="fixit" id="AutoTunability1" retvalue="false"> <cmd>set_param(''{0}'',''ParameterTunability'',''Auto'');</cmd> <txt> Set ''{1}'' to ''{3}''. </txt> </action> <action type="fixit" id="UnconstrainedTunability1" retvalue="false"> <cmd>set_param(''{0}'',''ParameterTunability'',''Unconstrained'');</cmd> <txt> Set ''{1}'' to ''{4}''. </txt> </action> </actions>

Unable to write to parameter ''{1}'' of block ''{0}'' with Parameter Writer blocks because ''{1}'' has no non-zero values and ''{2}'' is set to ''off''. <actions exclusiveFixIts="yes"> <action type="fixit" id="TunableD" retvalue="false"> <cmd>set_param(''{0}'',''AllowTunableDMatrix'',''on'');</cmd> <txt> Set ''{2}'' to ''on''. </txt> </action> </actions>
Unable to write to parameter ''{1}'' of block ''{0}'' with Parameter Writer blocks because ''{1}'' is set to a sparse matrix.
Unable to write to parameter ''{1}'' of block ''{0}'' with Parameter Writer blocks because ''{1}'' is set to ''auto''.
